## StateManagementModule class

Responsible for providing core state services Required in root and any feature modules that configures state providers like [Reducer](./state-management.reducer.md) or [Effect](./state-management.effect.md)<!-- -->.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare class StateManagementModule 
```
